TopicTitle: (RSS/RO) Constellation Essentials v1.3.1: Trusses, Engines, Adapters (Apr21)

Articles.Content: Yeah, true. It looks like I might just have to make my own 5 segment SRB.

BahamutoD, are you aware that your NTR is actually a trimodal and not a bimodal?

No biggy, just an observation.

I was basing it off this: http://eltamiz.com/files/BNTR.pdf

It says "bimodal" refers to thrust + power generation; the lox-augmentation is part of the thrust component I guess...*shrugs*

I was basing it off this: http://eltamiz.com/files/BNTR.pdf

It says "bimodal" refers to thrust + power generation; the lox-augmentation is part of the thrust component I guess...*shrugs*

straight up bimodal didn't have the lox afterburner; that's the upgraded version. Then it's LANTR, or sometimes, trimodal. Also TRITON (which seems to be a proper name for a Pratt & Whitney design). http://arc.aiaa.org/doi/abs/10.2514/6.2004-3863

hey are you almost done with the lander because i cant wait for it ahah but are you going to build this with the rockets from bobcat american pack because you can use these as the lifters rover and the orion craft so if you want to build it also for american pack, that would be fantastic

Another awesome mod from you BahamutoD!

Edit: Oh yeah, are we ever going to see those awesome animated engines from your youtube account?

Well its just a structural part, so whatever use you find for it.
